dependencies.description:
aiofiles is an Apache2 licensed library, written in Python, for handling
local disk files in asyncio applications.
dependencies.name: py-aiofiles

dependencies.description: Fast, simple object-to-object and broadcast signaling
dependencies.name: py-blinker

dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.
dependencies.name: py-click

dependencies.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.
dependencies.name: py-flask

dependencies.description: A ASGI Server based on Hyper libraries and inspired by Gunicorn.
dependencies.name: py-hypercorn

dependencies.description: Various helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments.
dependencies.name: py-itsdangerous

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.
dependencies.name: py-markupsafe

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git
dependencies.name: py-toml

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: The Swiss Army knife of Python web development
dependencies.name: py-werkzeug

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io
dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk

description: A Python ASGI web microframework with the same API as Flask.
name: py-quart

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
